SMBus Own Address Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x28
Size:
0x4

Description

Own slave address (for slave mode operation)

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:8] reserved r 0x0 Reserved
[7] addr_en rw 0x0 Address Enable
[6:0] own_addr rw 0x0 Own Address

Field Descriptions

reserved - Reserved

Reserved bits

addr_en - Address Enable

Enable own address matching (slave mode)

own_addr - Own Address

7-bit own slave address
